name: Email - Guest User Connector
brief: Enable users to use their own Microsoft 365 email account to send email in Business Central, if they are logged as a guest users
description: This connector enables users to send email from their own email account, if they are logged as a guest users in Business Central. After you set up this connector, it will ask user to login to their own email account, before sending emails from the guest account. You only need to set up this connector one time.
